QuestData.Title: The Earthen of Ulduar
QuestData.Description: The earthen who once inhabited, built, and maintained Ulduar were ousted from their home when Loken took over the city. Since then, his iron dwarf followers have relentlessly attacked the exiles.$B$BThey have taken refuge in an old titan building, which they now call Bouldercrag's Refuge, on the face of a mountain west of the Inventor's Library. Bouldercrag and his brethren fight to keep the irons from overrunning their haven, but they cannot hold their ground long. Find and help them, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Bouldercrag the Rockshaper at Bouldercrag's Refuge.
QuestData.RewardText: So you know Brann Bronzebeard, then? He is our closest ally among those of the flesh. We are as brothers in the struggle against Loken and his followers, in the fight for Ulduar.
